EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_CF Summit US Boston_Q218.Post Event Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for visiting us at CF Summit!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for swinging by the Pivotal booth at CF Summit! We hope you enjoyed the event, and are energized with new ways to help you deliver exceptional user experiences.
Ready for more content? Check out these resources or share them with your team:
- Running .NET apps on Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/the-one-true-platform-for-all-net-workloads-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-cf-summit-us-boston-q218]]>
- Run Kubernetes with Pivotal Container Service <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pivotal-container-service?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-cf-summit-us-boston-q218]]> - Check out the latest customer case studies <[[https://pivotal.io/platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-dynatrace-perform-las-vegas-q118]]> including Ford <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/ford?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-cf-summit-us-boston-q218]]> and Merrill <[[https://content.pivotal.io/videos/pivotalxmerrill-final-1?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-cf-summit-us-boston-q218]]>.
Also, all the talks from CF Summit can be found online <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLhuMOCWn4P9hJD3wsstF8gJIxOnJ_CTot]]>. The Pivotal Team
Join your peers at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-cf-summit-us-boston-q218]]> to pick up new skills and new ideas for building better software, faster. Register here <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-cf-summit-us-boston-q218]]> with the following discount code to get $100 off posted price. Code Attendee_CFSummit_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=northam-event-cf-summit-us-boston-q218]]>
